conversation.text: I would recommend "The Ring" over "Saw." "The Ring" is a classic horror film that has stood the test of time. It features stunning special effects and a gripping story that keeps you on the edge of your seat. On the other hand, "Saw" is a slasher film that focuses on gore and violence. While it has some memorable moments, "Saw" generally falls short when compared to "The Ring." In conclusion, both "The Ring" and "Saw" are horror films, but they offer very different experiences. If you're looking for a classic horror film with stunning special effects and a gripping story that keeps you on the edge of your seat, then I would recommend "The Ring". On the other hand, if you're looking for a slasher film with memorable moments but generally falls short when compared to "The Ring", then I would recommend "Saw"."
